changelog: - Fixed caduceus round shield copy pasta
- Fixed souls of lost undead by aquaduct being swapped
- Fixed souls of proud knight by shadow set being swapped
- Fixed plank shield and twin humanities in lower blighttown being swapped (polygon map is wrong)
- Added maps up through Duke's Archives
- Fixed some logic bugs in undead burg and full map
- Items: Tracking support for all progression items except snuggly's items
- Locations: Tracking support for all locations as of DSAP V0.0.8
- Logic: Location accessibility logic based on game state
- Autotracking: Support for automatic tracking of items, locations and settings when connected to an Archipelago server
- Autoupdates: Support for automatic updating of tracker pack when loaded
